TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PropertyAccessRule extends System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule
Public NotInheritable Class PropertyAccessRule Inherits ActiveDirectoryAccessRule

summary.span: The class represents a specific type of access rule that is used to allow or deny access to an Active Directory Domain Services property.

span.span: The class represents a specific type of access rule that is used to allow or deny access to an Active Directory Domain Services property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks このクラスは、Active Directory ドメイン サービス プロパティのアクセス規則の作成を簡素化するものです。This class is provided to simplify construction of an access rule for an Active Directory Domain Services property.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public PropertyAccessRule (System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference identity, System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType type, System.DirectoryServices.PropertyAccess access);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference identity, valuetype System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType type, valuetype System.DirectoryServices.PropertyAccess access) cil managed
Public Sub New (identity As IdentityReference, type As AccessControlType, access As PropertyAccess)
public: PropertyAccessRule(System::Security::Principal::IdentityReference ^ identity, System::Security::AccessControl::AccessControlType type, System::DirectoryServices::PropertyAccess access);

param.name: identity
param.span: An object that identifies the trustee of the access rule.

span.span: An object that identifies the trustee of the access rule.

param.name: type
param.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the access rule type.

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the access rule type.

param.name: access
param.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the property access type.

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the property access type.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified identity reference, access control type, and property access.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified identity reference, access control type, and property access.

remarks.format: ## Remarks このコンス トラクターを使用する場合は、すべてのプロパティ型に適用されるプロパティのアクセス規則を作成します。When you use this constructor, it creates a property access rule that applies to all property types.
